Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our flagship product, which I believe would significantly enhance your operations and bring substantial value to your business. Given its worth to you, I propose a special introductory offer of $12,000 for this exceptional item. This price not only ensures a fair return for us but also provides you with an opportunity to maximize your investment at a competitive rate. I look forward to discussing how this product can contribute to your success. Should you have any questions or require further information, please don't hesitate to reach out. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $12,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $12,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $10,000
